section.37: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Urwah bin Az-Zubair said:"Some people from 'Uraynah raided the milk camels of the Messenger of Allah [SAW] and drove them off, and killed a slave of his. The Messenger of Allah [SAW] sent (men) after them, and they were caught, and he had their hands and feet cut off, and their eyes gouged out
